issue.title: [CF 519] "Unit(s) to watch" is not updated by dropdown selection alone. Needs dropdown + semicolon or typed in manually.
issue.body:
When changing the Field: "Unit(s) to watch:" for Buffs/Debuffs from the default of Player to anything, the change is only recorded if I add a trailing semicolon after using the drop down menu or if I type in "target". The act of selecting the drop down menu "Target" or "Focus" does not in and of itself save the change.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.  See above.
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Expected drop down selection to effect a change in the status of the field.  No change in the status of the field is recorded.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
r528 (beta for MoP)  This is something that has happened in prior versions as well.

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No errors, just no change in the configuration.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
I'd be happy to provide any additional information you may deem useful.  If absolutely necessary, I could fraps the issue as I come across it.  It has occurred for every debuff I've attempted to configure to track target debuffs.

comments.body:
This seems to be one of the most error prone aspects of TMW for some reason. Thank you for reporting this; I will look into getting it fixed when I get a chance.

In the mean time, after you change the unit using the dropdown, click on the editbox and then press enter to make sure that the setting saves correctly.
